title: Patriots ready for Revis and Jets' defense
text:
Patriots ready for Revis and Jets' defense Patriots ready for Revis and Jets' defense Post to Facebook Patriots ready for Revis and Jets' defense Patriots ready for Revis and Jets' defense   wcsh6.com: http://on.wcsh6.com/1RX0tg1   Join the Conversation To   Patriots ready for Revis and Jets' defense Johnny Mehler, WLBZ 6:40 p.m. EDT October 21, 2015 FOXBORO, MA - SEPTEMBER 27: Tom Brady #12 of the New England Patriots looks on during the first quarter against the Jacksonville Jaguars at Gillette Stadium on September 27, 2015 in Foxboro, Massachusetts. Photo by Maddie Meyer/Getty Images (Photo: Photo by Maddie Meyer/Getty Images) CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
FOXBORO, Massachusetts 
(NEWS CENTER) -- A familiar face will return to Gillette Stadium on Sunday when the New England Patriots take on the New York Jets in a battle for first place. 
It will be the first time Darrelle Revis meets his former Super Bowl-champion teammates as a member of the opposition. 
As NEWS CENTER's Johnny Mehler reports, Tom Brady and the rest of the team are ready for the defense that Revis and the rest of the Jets bring to the playing field. Read or Share this story: http://on.wcsh6.com/1RX0tg1 TOP VIDEOS
